description: This header file `ansc_xsocket_internal_api.h` defines the prototypes for functions related to socket operations and socket wrapper management for the ANSC (Advanced Networking Service Container) framework. It declares interfaces for managing socket types, modes, protocols, addresses, and operations such as bind, connect, listen, send, receive, accept, and close, as well as sink management functions.

methods.name: AnscXsocketGetType
methods.description: Retrieves the type of the socket.

methods.name: AnscXsocketSetType
methods.description: Sets the type of the socket.

methods.name: AnscXsocketGetMode
methods.description: Retrieves the mode of the socket.

methods.name: AnscXsocketSetMode
methods.description: Sets the mode of the socket.

methods.name: AnscXsocketGetIpProtocol
methods.description: Gets the IP protocol used by the socket.

methods.name: AnscXsocketSetIpProtocol
methods.description: Sets the IP protocol for the socket.

methods.name: AnscXsocketGetHostAddress
methods.description: Retrieves the host address associated with the socket.

methods.name: AnscXsocketSetHostAddress
methods.description: Sets the host address for the socket.

methods.name: AnscXsocketGetHostName
methods.description: Retrieves the host name associated with the socket.

methods.name: AnscXsocketSetHostName
methods.description: Sets the host name for the socket.

methods.name: AnscXsocketGetHostPort
methods.description: Gets the host port number.

methods.name: AnscXsocketSetHostPort
methods.description: Sets the host port number.

methods.name: AnscXsocketGetHostAddrInfo
methods.description: Gets the address info structure for the host.

methods.name: AnscXsocketSetHostAddrInfo
methods.description: Sets the address info structure for the host.

methods.name: AnscXsocketGetPeerAddress
methods.description: Retrieves the peer (remote) address.

methods.name: AnscXsocketSetPeerAddress
methods.description: Sets the peer (remote) address.

methods.name: AnscXsocketGetPeerName
methods.description: Retrieves the peer (remote) name.

methods.name: AnscXsocketSetPeerName
methods.description: Sets the peer (remote) name.

methods.name: AnscXsocketGetPeerPort
methods.description: Gets the peer port number.

methods.name: AnscXsocketSetPeerPort
methods.description: Sets the peer port number.

methods.name: AnscXsocketGetPeerAddrInfo
methods.description: Gets the address info structure for the peer.

methods.name: AnscXsocketSetPeerAddrInfo
methods.description: Sets the address info structure for the peer.

methods.name: AnscXsocketGetTransportType
methods.description: Retrieves the transport type of the socket.

methods.name: AnscXsocketSetTransportType
methods.description: Sets the transport type for the socket.

methods.name: AnscXsocketGetXsink
methods.description: Gets the associated sink object for the socket.

methods.name: AnscXsocketSetXsink
methods.description: Associates a sink object with the socket.

methods.name: AnscXsocketResolveAddr
methods.description: Resolves the socket address.

methods.name: AnscXsocketApplyDSCP
methods.description: Applies DSCP settings to the socket.

methods.name: AnscXsocketBind
methods.description: Binds the socket to an address.

methods.name: AnscXsocketConnect
methods.description: Connects the socket to a remote address.

methods.name: AnscXsocketListen
methods.description: Sets the socket to listen for incoming connections.

methods.name: AnscXsocketSend
methods.description: Sends data through the socket.

methods.name: AnscXsocketSend2
methods.description: Sends data through the socket, possibly with additional options.

methods.name: AnscXsocketOpen
methods.description: Opens or creates the socket.

methods.name: AnscXsocketClose
methods.description: Closes the socket.

methods.name: AnscXsocketAcceptTask
methods.description: Handles incoming connection acceptance tasks.

methods.name: AnscXsocketRecvTask
methods.description: Handles receiving data tasks.

methods.name: AnscXsinkCreate
methods.description: Creates a sink object.

methods.name: AnscXsinkRemove
methods.description: Removes/destroys a sink object.

methods.name: AnscXsinkGetXsocket
methods.description: Retrieves the associated socket with the sink.

methods.name: AnscXsinkSetXsocket
methods.description: Associates a socket with the sink.

methods.name: AnscXsinkAttach
methods.description: Attaches a sink to a socket.

methods.name: AnscXsinkDetach
methods.description: Detaches the sink from its socket.

methods.name: AnscXsinkGetRecvBuffer
methods.description: Retrieves buffer for receiving data.

methods.name: AnscXsinkAccept
methods.description: Accepts an incoming connection on the sink.

methods.name: AnscXsinkRecv
methods.description: Receives data via the sink.

methods.name: AnscXsinkClose
methods.description: Closes the sink, with option for peer-related closure.

methods.name: AnscXsinkAbort
methods.description: Aborts the sink operations.
